name: Ankur Prasad
body: ## *About Me* I am Graduate Student in Computer Engineering, focussing on VLSI design, currently in my final semester. I am basically from India and have completed my Bachelors Degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering from National Institute of Technology, Tiruchirappalli, India. I worked for a couple of years in Silicon Physical Design at Qualcomm, Bangalore, India before deciding to pursue my Masters. ## *Why CPSC 656?* As a Graduate student in Computer Engineering, I have spent most of my time exploring the various aspects of VLSI design. Now, in my final semester, I decided to diversify a little with this fascinating course which brings to light the nuances of interaction between Humans and Computational Media. ## *List of Media I use* - Cellphone - Voice/Video calls - Skype - Facetime - Instant Messaging - Text Messaging - Whatsapp - Telegram - Facebook Messenger - Internet - Video - Netflix - Hulu - Youtube - Social Network - Facebook - Twitter - Text Media - News websites (Times of India) - Quora - Email - Gmail - Music - Spotify - Apple Music - Television - Indian Movies - Comedy shows (The Big Bang Theory) - Reality TV shows(Top Gear) - Drama shows (How to get away with murder, Breaking Bad) - Sports (NBA, Cricket, Tennis) - Printed Media - Fiction Novels (Dan Brown, Irving Wallace) - Research Journals and Published Technical Papers - Subject Text Books and Notes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
